title: The client got slower
body:
After the latest patch, my client got slower and my in-game FPS keeps dropping. This only happens with lol and no other games.

And NO, I AM NOT GOING TO SEND YOU MY LOGS AGAIN JUST SO THAT YOU CAN SAY "CHEKC YOUR INTERNET". MY INTERNET IS JUST FINE ITS YOUR GAME.

replies.body:
Those logs would actually be pretty helpful in cases like this if we want to figure out why your ping or fps might have dropped. If nothing looked wrong with those logs in the past, it's likely there was some issue going on with your ISP. 

If you're willing to, grab those network logs from a game that had those fps stutters and lag and let this [**log reader**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209765743) scan it. Post a screenshot of what it shows here for me to see so that I can know how you need to address this. Otherwise, it's pretty hard to even know where to begin.
